name: Lower Decks 2D - Test Gameplay
description:
Lower Decks is a 2D side-scrolling Sci-Fi action game. The player controls the main character Bobby Bailey in short Beebee. Beebee is this spaceship engineer who works in the lower decks of the ship. The main mission is to eliminate the enemies who attacked the ship and tries to take control of the ship and also restore the damaged systems of the Ship. 

Version 0.1 (Alpha)
